name: Prisme Libre Illuminating & Color Correcting Loose Powder
about: What it is: A color-correcting loose setting & finishing powder that blurs, illuminates, and sets makeup for 12 hours, delivering a natural radiant finish & all-day shine control...Coverage: Light..Finish: Radiant..Formulation: Loose Powder..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Prismatic Light Technology: Combines soft-focus powder to blur and light-reflecting pearls to illuminate and enhance skinu2019s natural radiance...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: The 4-color loose powder features Prismatic Light Technology to set makeup & illuminate skin. The long-wearing, non-comedogenic, dermatologically tested, waterproof & weightless formula has two colors for correction & two for radiance...Clinical Results: In a self-assessment questionnaire by 104 volunteers from 20 to 40 years old, after testing at least once a day for one week:.- 100% of users said their complexion was instantly more radiant.- 96% of users said the loose powder corrects and revives a dull complexion
ingredients: -Prismatic Light Technology: Combines soft-focus powder to blur and light-reflecting pearls to illuminate....Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Kaolin, Silica, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Parfum (Fragrance), Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Aqua (Water), Paeonia Lactiflora Root Extract, Trehalose, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 73360 (Red 30 Lake), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-This powder can be used alone to even out the complexion, as a setting powder to lock in foundation, or as the last step in your routine to finish your makeup look..-IApply lightly with the puff provided for an even and precise application or with a brush for an all-over perfected look....For Puff Application:.-Twist off the cap and hold the puff over the opening..-Shake the powder twice..-Stamp the powder on the cheekbones, sides of nose, forehead, and chin..-Diffuse the powder by blending out with the puff to create an even, flawless complexion..-Repeat as needed for desired result....For Brush Application:.-Dispense a small amount of powder onto the lid..-Swirl a large fluffy brush into the product..-Tap off excess product..- Lightly buff into skin...-Repeat as needed for desired result.

reviews.review_title: Why do makeup brands keep ruining their products!?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just like every other unpaid review says, the new formula is terrible :( I love glowy makeup but this has straight up shimmer in it! Makeup keeps getting more expensive and the brands make the packaging and formulas cheaper. Thereu2019s also slightly less product than there used to be (you can check for yourself). These brands will keep doing these as long as we allow them so I really think itu2019s important to talk about these points and not dismissing their greed!
